name: Sports Hero
description:
Are you up for a challenge? The TRACK & FIELD game of 2016 is finally here!

Enjoy the RETRO-STYLE visuals and play against your friends on one device in the PLAYER VS. PLAYER MODE or take part in the big competition to LEVEL UP and UNLOCK NEW DISCIPLINES!

100m SPRINT
WEIGHTLIFTING
JAVELIN THROW
50m SWIMMING
110m HURDLES
LONG JUMP
ROWING
800m RACE

Take your NATIONAL TEAM to the PODIUM of the biggest sporting event in the world!
